remarks: Group division (or subtraction) operation value.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpdiv.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpdiv.2 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
grpdiv.3 $e |- D = ( /g ` G ) $.
grpodivval $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( A G ( N ` B ) ) ) $.
